formalpara.title: Summary
formalpara.para: You can reset options to revert them to their default values.

step.para: Select the volume and click the Volume Options tab from the Details pane.
The Volume Options tab displays a list of options set for the volume.
Select the option you want to reset. Click Reset. A dialog box displays, prompting to confirm the reset option.

note.para: You can reset all volume options by clicking Reset All button. A dialog box displays, prompting to confirm the reset option. Click OK. All volume options are reset for the selected volume.

formalpara.title: Result
formalpara.para: You have reset volume options to default.
